actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Energy and Commerce.  Report No: 100-777.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Service Act to extend programs for health information and health promotion.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Energy and Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 100-777) Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1989 through 1991 for health information and promotion programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Service Act to extend programs for health information and health promotion.
